## Vault.recreate() method

Calculate the parameters of an [openVault()](./lib-base.transactablemoneyp.openvault.md) transaction that will result in the given Vault.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static recreate(that: Vault, borrowingRate?: Decimalish): VaultCreationParams<Decimal>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  that | [Vault](./lib-base.vault.md) | The Vault to recreate. |
|  borrowingRate | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Current borrowing rate. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[VaultCreationParams](./lib-base.vaultcreationparams.md)<!-- -->&lt;[Decimal](./lib-base.decimal.md)<!-- -->&gt;
